author: Angie (Sweet Sidekick)
title: GAP Men’s Jeans Only $19.42 Each Shipped Today Only (Regularly $59.95)
text:
Head over to Gap.com where you can save an additional 40% off when you purchase two pairs of select Men’s Jeans – discount automatically applied.
Even better, you can save an extra 40% off your purchase when you use the code SPRING at checkout valid through today only. AND, you can save an additional 10% off your purchase when you use the code BONUS at checkout. Shipping is free on orders of $50 or more BEFORE promo codes are applied.

Men’s Jeans Deal Idea: Buy 2 pairs Men’s Jeans $59.95 each 
Total After 40% off sale = $71.94
Use the codes SPRING and BONUS 
Shipping is free on orders over $50
Final Cost $38.84 shipped for both pairs – only $19.42 shipped per pair!

Save MORE with Discounted eGift Cards! Head on over to Staples.com where they are offering up 20% off select Gap brand gift cards valid for Old Navy, GAP, Baby Gap, Athleta & Banana Republic! For more information head HERE .
